short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the new tabs and windows on your browser to best suit your needs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigator is your go-to web browser extension that makes surfing the web a breeze. Picture having a personal guide that keeps all your favorite sites just a click away, tidies up your browsing history by grouping similar pages, and lets you zip straight to your top sites without a hitch. Plus, you can set up your own shortcuts to jump to frequently visited pages in no time. It's all wrapped up in a sleek design that blends right into your browser, keeping things simple yet stylish. And don't sweat about privacy â€“ Navigator keeps all your browsing goodies to itself, ensuring your online adventures stay personal. Whether you're diving deep into research or just casually browsing, Navigator smooths out the ride so you can focus on what matters.
